attributes.action: remove the right of Anglican Bishops to sit in the House of Lords.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the 21st Century, religion has no place in politics, and members of the Anglican Church heirarchy should not be allowed to have any say in the way the UK is run.

Parliament and the Church should be two separate entities, neither having any say in how the other is managed.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
